content.rendered:
Myanmar Airways International Co., Ltd. is a privately owned airline headquartered in Yangon, Myanmar. It operates scheduled international services to destinations mainly in Southeast Asia and is based at Yangon International Airport. Myanmar Airways International was the sponsor of the 2013 Southeast Asian Games. MAI’s logo shows pyinsarupa , a traditional Burmese chimeric animal.

 

 Queries handled Myanmar Airways International Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Sky Smile Privilege Program

List of Myanmar Airways International Offices

Myanmar – Yangon
Myanmar – Yangon
Myanmar – Yangon
Myanmar – Yangon

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Myanmar Airways International Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
